title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 431.2 - Contents of bill
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 431.2 - Contents of bill

State Regulations

If any corporation, partnership or person furnishing gas, electric, steam or water service elects to impose a one-time charge for late
payment for such service, it shall show on each bill the amount billed, the
amount that will be due, including the late payment charge, when the late
payment charge becomes applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
431.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
